# Data sources

The data sources of this project are from [*Scipps CO2 Program](https://scrippsco2.ucsd.edu)

## Monthly average CO2 concentrations

**Dataset : monthly_flask_co2___.csv**

Atmospheric CO2 Data collected from active sampling station

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(tidyverse)
names <- read_csv("./data/station_names.csv")
knitr::kable(names, caption = "Sampling stations", row.names = F,font_size = 10)
```

**Issues with this dataset: **

All stations are located in the pacific area along having similar longitude.

seawater_bats <- read_csv("./data/station_names.csv")
